meanings.definition: Crappies (noun): a type of freshwater fish often sought after by anglers.
meanings.sent1: Anglers enjoy catching crappies in the lake.
meanings.sent2: I went fishing and caught a few crappies for dinner.
meanings.sent3: Why did the fisherman bring a net to catch the crappies?
meanings.sent4: The shimmering scales of the crappies reflected the sunlight beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The crappies swam gracefully in the clear water, mesmerizing all who watched.

meanings.definition: Crappies (adjective): of poor quality or value; inferior.
meanings.sent1: The store was selling crappies merchandise at a discount.
meanings.sent2: I was disappointed with the crappies quality of the product.
meanings.sent3: The crappies cupcakes were a big flop at the bake sale.
meanings.sent4: The crappies service at the restaurant left much to be desired.
meanings.sent5: The crappies paint job on the car started peeling after just a week.
